item.title: M5 Chip Coming to iPad Pro This Fall
item.description: Refreshed iPad Pro models will be the first device to get Apple’s faster M5 chip, reports Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. Apple’s high-end tablets could be refreshed as soon as October. Apple last updated th
